post.body: dinner w/ the bf afterwards wasn't bad either .. lol
Very true. Best day ever was 2 trips to the pet store w/ 2 children under the age of 7, followed by the zoo.
Night hon. Sweetest of dreams!
puppy's make everything in life better .. almost ;-)
that's a great dip recipie, hon .. and easy! Congrats again!
The progress quips make me laugh more than my score :-)
You did perfect!
Feel better soon!
Night! Sweet dreams
So awesome to see you again, little mom!
count me in on a doer for the To Do-er list
oh hon .. I missed your early tweet, but am sending lots of love now
Oh! Thank You so VERY Much! re: HTML bg designs. Need to find something Christmasy *hugs*
Perfect!
LMAO .. give them a bible (sorry .. couldn't resisit)
Snow hooky sounds great! Haven't done that since I was a kid. Too bad I'm not in Chicago ;)
aww, how sweet of you. Thank You! I hope your Tuesday has been awesome, too.
aghhh!! Please don't wait unti lthis week. You couldn't get it ASAP?!
I just told someone else this .. & in case you don't know or aren't, up your Vit C level. Helps boost immune system.
re: emails .. I still haven't cleared out my emails for the day. Forgot to open it up until late afternoon. Big mistake! lol
it's always a good thing to up your Vit C intake, esp. during rush times of the holidays (not that you wanted advice from me)*hugs*
you feeling better today, hon? *sending hugs* Baking sounds fun. What kind of cookies?
thank you!
Whenever you say "newmediakid" I automatically smile. Hope your weekend is filled w/ relaxation & love *hugs*
love your twitter name. Vanilla Pumpkin just sounds like it smells good! *hugs*
*hugs back* I get the biggest kick out of your little dancing avatar!!
Violent responses to useage of tweeple? It's rather common. Send whomever a hug, they're probably not used to or bored w/ it
voice search? Amazing.
AND .. include the "M" word ... *laughing*
I'm scanning them now to send to you .. they fit you perfectly & are a reflection of our last conversation in HUGE ways
LMAO! You're lucky I saw that. Honey, put @ in front of fairiemoonchild to make sure I get messages.. but driving :-/
-- you're going to choke when you see your Angel cards ... even I almost choked when I saw what channeled for you! *HUGESMILE*
very good grasshopper .. now what are your ankle bones connected to? lol
LMAO! Aren't you going to translate the tweets for us? :-)
I'm sorry to hear that. *sends you loving energy*
they're just so hard to resist, ya know ;)
real Mexican food is always delish .. esp. love tamales during the holidays (altho' my tummy is not completely a fan.. lol)
LOL .. I'm feeling your pain. Scary Panda ;-)
Now if only those blessing would make my vacuum cleaner a better sucker upper. lol
Feeling very blessed today w/ unexpected opportunities given to help another.
I don't mind my 1980's hair ... when I don't have to look at it. Have to change my avatar if I'm going to tweet more often.
I think I need a new vacuum cleaner. One with the jaws of life suction power.
Ever had questions about people you wish you understood better? Ask about my newcomer special. I can help.
Full moon tonight. Can you feel it?
Have you done something nice for someone today? And have you been good to yourself? Just checkin' ...
Cute Holiday Puzzle http://tinyurl.com/6plhs
Christmas Question: ... "What difference will YOU make in someone's life this Christmas?"
Anyone have a good site for HTML web page backgrounds?
lots of publishers getting on the Twitter bandwagon this week
btw.. to a few of you I've talke to today .. If you dwell on what you don't want, that's the outcome you give power to & pull toward you!
I have been so busy today I'd forgotten to check my emails until just now .. over explosion of emails. oops ;-)
My Cell phone charger in not giving my cell phone a charger upper. That can't be good.
Tuesday Shopping Special $2.99 for those interested http://tinyurl.com/6eute2
well, that link worked lovely. Not.
I have so much web work to figure out and do my brain could almost fall out
Hoping that Christmas Joy has wrapped it's way around your weekend!
Yay! Crabby client is officially now uncrabby! *does the happy dance*
1 house guest is very negative & doesn't see it. Am having to dble up on patience, understanding, sending out empathy & *uh huh* warmth.
Hello! @newmediajim @ChicShoppaChick @WickedStepMom @tradingnothing @ChrisSandberg @mousewords @podcastmama @SeanAMcAlister @amyderby
(and no, anger is NOT a part of healthy communication .. I KNEW you'd come up w/ that! LOL)
